ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie, 2  eggs,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon,   +   1/2 cup white sugar,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 cups half-and-half cream, 1 cup persimmon pulp, 2 tablespoons butter, melted, 1 teaspoon lemon juice
nutrition: Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 8g 42%, Cholesterol 77mg 26%, Sodium 253mg 11%, Total Carbohydrate 36g 13%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 13g, Protein 5g, Vitamin C 20mg 101%, Calcium 83mg 6%, Iron 2mg 9%, Potassium 203mg 4%
